items.prompt: According to Herzberg, which of these is a 'motivator' rather than a 'hygiene factor'?
items.explanation: Recognition is a motivator that leads to job satisfaction; salary and conditions only prevent dissatisfaction.

items.prompt: Choose the correct form: 'I remember ____ (attend) the team-building seminar last year. It was very useful.'
items.explanation: 'Remember + gerund' refers to a past memory.

options: The number of hours worked per week
The rate at which employees leave the organization
The average age of the workforce
items.explanation: Staff turnover is the rate of employee departures and replacements.

items.prompt: Complete the sentence: 'We tried ____ (offer) remote work options, but productivity decreased.'
items.explanation: 'Try + gerund' means to experiment with an action to see if it works.

options: Motivation driven by external rewards like money
Motivation driven by internal satisfaction or interest
Motivation caused by fear of punishment
items.explanation: Intrinsic motivation comes from within the individual (e.g., pride in work, personal growth).
